title: Petrified Forest National Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Eating The Painted Desert Diner and a convenience store for snacks are located next to the Painted Desert Visitor Center. Limited snacks are also available for purchase at the curio shop in Rainbow Forest. These sites are operated by our new concessionaire Ortega National Parks. Painted Desert Diner is open daily 8:00am to 3:00pm. View the menu (pdf, 871 KB) Camping There are no campgrounds in the park, and parking overnight is not allowed. Backpacking is allowed within the Petrified Forest National Wilderness Area and permits are FREE! Visit the camping page for information on camping outside the park. Lodging Overnight accommodation is not available in the park, but can be found in nearby communities.   Visit the Goods and Services page for nearby communities' chamber of commerce information.
